subject: Shipping Order #SSN5648
description_text:
Good evening, I've made an order on the 2nd of Jan and it's been five days
and I have yet to receive a shipping confirmation. Do you guys have any
idea when my product will be shipped?

conversations.body_text: Hi Ben_Ciel,    We apologize for the delay. Two shipments have been impacted by heavy snowfall in Europe, with road blockages causing delivery delays to our warehouse. We will expedite delivery to the warehouse as soon as possible or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your goods from China.
No problem, thank you for the update.
